get_gps_sequence¶

gwasr.helpers.fetch_params.get_gps_sequence(start, end, step)¶

Get a sequence of GPS times.

Parameters
startint

starting GPS

endint

ending GPS

stepint

time between two consecutive GPS times

Returns
numpy array

consecutive GPS times (every step seconds)
